text: The Costa Rica women's national handball team is the national team of Costa Rica. It is governed by the Federacion Costaricense de Balonmano and takes part in international handball competitions. ==Results== ===Pan American Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- | 1997||round robin||5th||5||0||1||4||62||144 |- | 2013||9th place game||10th||5||0||0||5||64||197 |} ===Central American and Caribbean Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- |align=left| 2018 Barranquilla |7th place game |7th |5 |1 |0 |4 |108 |146 |} ===Central American Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- style="background:silver;" | 2017||gold medal match||2nd||5||2||0||3||118||110 |} ===Central American Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- style="background:#cfaa88;" | 2014 ||round robin||3rd||4||2||1||1||93||85 |- style="background:#cfaa88;" | 2016 ||round robin||3rd||4||2||0||2||91||76 |} ==External links== * *IHF profile Category:Women's national handball teams Handball Category:Women's handball in Costa Rica
